thread.title: Bruno Mars and The Time Paid Tribute to Prince at the 2017 Grammys
thread.title_full: Bruno Mars and The Time Paid Tribute to Prince at the 2017 Grammys

author: Noisey Staff
title: Bruno Mars and The Time Paid Tribute to Prince at the 2017 Grammys
text:
Bruno Mars and The Time Paid Tribute to Prince at the 2017 Grammys The stage turns purple on Grammy night. 
Bruno Mars and The Time took the stage to pay tribute to the late Prince at the 2017 Grammys. Morris Day and The Time started the tribute. Bruno Mars followed up dressed in ruffles and purple like Prince, performing "Let's Go Crazy" from Purple Rain . He ended his set on an electrifying guitar solo. Watch the performance below. 
Photo Screengrab of performance.
